name: Death's Compass
description:
You are Death and you annual performance check is due.

Protect souls from the dark angel until their time has run out. Use your compass to find souls whose time has ran out. Slay them with your scythe to claim victory.
Soar through the magic village by grappling with your grappling hook.

Music: Jelle van Aanholt
Game: Valentijn Muijrers
